name: Oktoberfest Manager
description:
Do you have what it takes to make a truly successful Oktoberfest landlord? Build your own beer tent, create the typical Oktoberfest atmosphere and make a fortune! Only then you'll be able to host the traditional opening ceremony!

With the exciting simulation of the largest people's fair in the world you can work your way up to a celebrated beer tent manager. Carefully pick the location for your tent and choose decoration, staff, ambience and bands to attract scores of thirsty customers and maximize your profits.
